short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A joke generator. Make your friends and family laugh with a click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jester is a handy Chrome extension designed to inject some humor and levity into your browsing experience. With this extension installed, you'll be treated to a daily dose of jokes, puns, and funny memes, right in your browser's new tab page. The extension is easy to use and lightweight, and it won't slow down your browsing speed. If you're looking to add a little bit of fun and laughter to your online routine, Jester is the perfect tool to help you do just that. So why not give it a try and see what kinds of laughs and smiles it can bring to your day?
